009package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
010
011import imagingbook.common.color.adapt.BradfordAdaptation;
012import imagingbook.common.color.adapt.ChromaticAdaptation;
013
014import static imagingbook.common.color.cie.StandardIlluminant.D50;
015import static imagingbook.common.color.cie.StandardIlluminant.D65;
016
017/**
018 * A color space implementing this interface indicates that it can convert internal color values directly to and from
019 * D65-based XYZ coordinates, without going through the standard (D50-based) Profile Conversion Space (PCS). This is
020 * useful for converting between D65-based color spaces since it avoids additional conversions to and from D50-based
021 * PCS. The interface specifies methods {@link #toCIEXYZ65(float[])} and {@link #fromCIEXYZ65(float[])} for direct
022 * conversion between the color space's native color values and D65 XYZ-coordinates, respectively.
023 *
024 * @author WB
025 * @version 2022/11/15
026 */
027public interface DirectD65Conversion {
028        
029        static final ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D65, D50);
030        static final ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D50, D65);
031        
032        // methods required by all implementations of ColorSpace:
033        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] value);
034        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] value);
035        public float[] toRGB(float[] value);
036        public float[] fromRGB(float[] value);
037        
038        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
039
040        /**
041         * Analogous to {@link #fromCIEXYZ(float[])} but accepts D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values. D65-based
042         * color spaces should override this method to avoid the additional D65 to D50 conversion.
043         *
044         * @param xyz65 D65-based XYZ color values
045         * @return color values in this color space
046         */
047        public default float[] fromCIEXYZ65(float[] xyz65) {
048                float[] XYZ50 = catD65toD50.applyTo(xyz65);
049                return this.fromCIEXYZ(XYZ50);
050        }
051
052        /**
053         * Analogous to {@link #toCIEXYZ(float[])} but returns D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values. D65-based
054         * color spaces should override this method to avoid the additional D50 to D65 conversion.
055         *
056         * @param value color value in this color space
057         * @return D65-based XYZ color values
058         */
059        public default float[] toCIEXYZ65(float[] value) {
060                float[] XYZ50 = this.toCIEXYZ(value);
061                return catD50toD65.applyTo(XYZ50);
062        }
063        
064}
